Text:
As a proud Newfoundland I fully agree with you. Who misinterprets flares in such a time that it could (and did) cost hundreds of lives. 

500 Newfoundlanders died that day. Among them my Great Uncle. Luckily my Grandfather was too young to have joined.. There's avery good chance he could have been in those number otherwise if he had of been just a cpl of years older and I never would have been born
